teams.name: The Company Cube
teams.loan_because: We believe that we can create a more just and fraternal economy with one small act of kindness at a time.
teams.description: Our team consists of individuals and businesses who are committed to putting the human person at the center of all business activity, and who believe that our daily actions can significantly alter the world's economic landscape for the better.

teams.name: Selfies Can Help #SelfiesCanHelp
teams.loan_because: We want to encourage people to join our kindness revolution.
teams.description: The mission of Selfies Can Help is to encourage people to take a national pastime, taking selfies, and turn it into a positively driven action. By sharing photographic acts of kindness, you’ll be helping to inspire others to do the same. Selfless selfies.
